column2: "O Galatiafo adwenmuharfo! Woana ara tumii daadaa hom dɛm? Hom ampaara a wɔdze Jesus Kraest a wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu no esi hom enyim pɔkyee akyerɛ mo no nye yi?"
"Dza mepɛ dɛ metse fi hom anomu ara nye dɛ
column3: Ana hom nam mbra ndwuma no do nyaa Sunsum no
column4: anaa hom nam gyedzi asɛm a hom tsee no do?"

column2: "Ana hom yɛ adwenhar dɛm a? Hom hyɛɛ ase wɔ Sunsum mu a
column3: afei ɔyɛ dɛn na hom ruwie no honam mu yi?"

column2: "Ntsi hom ehu amandze pii yi gyan? Aso ampa dɛ enya ayɛ gyan a?"
"Ana nyia ɔdze Sunsum no ma hom
column3: na ɔyɛ tum ndwuma wɔ hom mu no
column4: ɔnam mbra ndwuma do na ɔyɛ
column5: anaa ɔnam gyedzi asɛmpa a hom tsee no do?"

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ Abraham gyee Nyankopɔn dzii
column3: na wobuu no tsenenee maa no no
column5: "dɛmara so na hom nhu dɛ hɔn a wɔgye dzi no

column2: "Na kyerɛwsɛm no dzii kan hun dɛ Nyankopɔn nam gyedzi do bobu amanaman bem ntsi
column3: kyerɛwsɛm dzii kan kaa asɛmpa no kyerɛɛ Abraham dɛ
column4: Wo mu na wobehyira amanaman nyina."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hɔn a wofi gyedzi mu no woehyira hɔn aka gyedzinyi Abraham ho."
"Na dodow a wɔdze hɔnho to mbra ndwuma do no
column3: wɔwɔ ndom ase
column5: Ndom aka obiara a ɔnnkɔ do ntsena dza ɔwɔ mbra nwoma no nyina mu

column2: "Na ɔyɛ pefee dɛ
column3: mbra mu dze
column4: obi nndzi bem wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim; osiandɛ
column5: Ɔtseneneenyi nam gyedzi do bɛtsena ase."

column2: "Ɔwɔ mu dɛ mbra mmfi gyedzi mu
column3: naaso
column4: Nyia ɔyɛ dza mbra no hwehwɛ no nam mu benya nkwa."

column2: "Kraest poon hɛn fii mbra no no ndom mu
column3: osiandɛ wɔdze no yɛɛ ndom maa hɛn: na wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column4: Ndom aka obiara a ɔsɛn dua do:"

column2: "ama Abraham ne nhyira no nam Kraest Jesus do aaba amanamamfo no do
column3: na ɔnam gyedzi do hɛn nsa aaka Sunsum a wɔdze bɔɔ anohoba no."

column2: "Enuanom
column3: medze dza yehu no daa reyɛ mfatoho: Nyimpa ne samansew a wɔasɔw ano mpo

column2: "Afei
column3: Abraham nye n'asenyi na wɔbɔɔ hɔn anohoba no. Anohoba no nnka dɛ
column5: dɛ gyama wɔyɛ pii; na mbom ɔka dɛ
column6: Nye w'asenyi; iyi kyerɛ dɛ ɔbaako

column2: "Na dza mese nye dɛ
column3: Ahyɛmu a Nyankopɔn dzii kan hyɛɛ no dzen (siee Kraest mu) no
column4: mbra no a n'ekyir mfe ahaanan eduasa ansaana ɔbae no

column2: "Na sɛ egyapadze no fi mbra mu a
column3: nna ommfi anohoba mu bio: na Abraham dze
column4: Nyankopɔn nam anohoba no do dze kyɛɛ no."

column2: "Nna dɛm a mbra no nye dza ɔwɔ hen? Mbrato ntsi na wɔdze kaa ho dze kesii dɛ asenyi no a wɔdze anohoba no bɔɔ no no bɛba; na wɔnam abɔfo do hyɛe wɔ ntamugyinafo nsamu."
"Na ntamugyinafo nnyɛ ɔbaako
column3: na Nyankopɔn dze ɔyɛ ɔbaako."

column2: "Nna mbra no tsia Nyankopɔn anohoba no anaa? Atserkwa
column3: oho! Na sɛ wɔhyɛɛ mbra bi a obotum ama nkwa a

column2: "Na kyerɛwsɛm no apata adze nyina ahyɛ bɔn ase
column3: ama anohoba no a ɔnam Kraest mu gyedzi do no
column4: wɔdze aama hɔn a wɔgye dzi."

column2: "Na ansaana gyedzi rebɛba no
column3: wɔdze hɛn siee mbra no mu weɔn hɛn
column4: maa gyedzi a wɔrebɛda no edzi akyerɛ no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: nna mbra no yɛ hɛn kyerɛfo ara dze hɛn ba Kraest nkyɛn
column4: ama wɔnam gyedzi do eebu hɛn bem."

column2: "Na nkyii gyedzi enya aba yi
column3: yɛnnda ho nnhyɛ ɔkyerɛfo no ase bio."

column2: "Na hom nyina nam gyedzi do yɛ Nyankopɔn mba wɔ Kraest Jesus mu."
"Na hom mu dodow a woenuma hɔn akɔ Kraest mu no wɔahyɛ Kraest
column6: ɔbarimba anaa ɔbaa nnyi beebi: na hom nyina ayɛ kor wɔ Kraest Jesus mu."

column2: "Na sɛ hom yɛ Kraest dze a
column3: na hom yɛ Abraham asefo
column4: na hom nam anohoba no do yɛ adzedzifo."
